node_settings.input_walletTokens_description: Here you can set how many tokens you already have in your wallet, so all the calculations will be more accurate for you.

projection_chart.create_at_ten: Create a new node once you reach 10 ${token}

node_settings.input_rewards_description: This value is fetched from CoinGecko, in {currency} ({symbol}) every {period} {unit}.

etherum.input_rewards_description: This is a rough estimation of rewards based on an average of 6400 Etherum blocs completed per day. You earn 0.1 ${ticker} per 7000 Etherum blocks completed.
etherum.input_rewards_description_etherscan: If you want to see the historical number of blocks produced on the Ethereum network and the total block reward, you can download all the values from Etherscan, in a CSV file

node_settings.input_nodeCount_description: The 10 ${ticker} {token} that you need to have in order to create another node will be earned in approximatly {count} {days}, including the {wallet} {token} you already have in your wallet.
node_settings.input_nodeCount_description_countReached: You already have the 10 ${ticker} {token} required tokens to create another node.
node_settings.input_nodeCount_description_zeroNode: Without ${ticker} nodes you can't earn tokens...
